selected_quotes: Comment on Tostes MH (2012): Altered neurotrophin, neuropeptide, cytokines and nitric oxide levels in autism.

citation.abstract: Modifications in neurotrophins, neuropeptides, cytokines and nitric oxide (NO) levels in autism may represent different biological aspects of the disease. In the present study we investigate simultaneously all these variables as an attempt to clarify their interrelationships in autism.
citation.title: Altered Neurotrophin, Neuropeptide, Cytokines and Nitric Oxide Levels in Autism.
